title: Study
description: Encodes basic information about any study, project, sub-project, etc.; that is to say any administrative grouping (or sub-grouping) of experimental data and metadata

id.description: A string uniquely identifying this study

collection.description: A CV term describing the top-level collection containing this study (e.g. HMP, NeMO, HMBR, etc.)

study_name.description: A short, human-readable label for this study

website.description: The URL of a website describing this study

grant_IDs.description: An array of strings identifying all grants funding this study

comment.description: A generic placeholder for any text describing this study

part_of_study.description: An array of IDs of all (larger) studies that contain this study as a sub-unit (EXCLUDING the top-level dataset already described by this study's 'collection' property)

tags.description: An array of descriptive strings to make this study 'taggable'

_search.description: An object containing additional (unstructured) data to enhance searching
